html:
The weather in Smallenske

PhotoVideo
  • All news tapes
  • News
  • Country and world
  • Society
  • Sport
  • Business
  • Subscription
  • 100 years old!

Smolenska and the field. Main developments in the city

10 minutes.
In one street in the Smolenska Industrial Area, lights will be turned off.

This is being warned by the Smolenskavtodor with reference to the GCOBD AGREEMENT. The shutdown will take place today, 15 February.

46 minutes ago
Smolenska will turn off hot water in five houses.
The residents of five houses will have to walk without her until the end of the day.
Today, 08:02
The Smolensk family continues to receive assistance
On 12 February, staff members and members of the youth council of the UFFS met with the family Half-bags and handed them the acquired washing machine and the products.


Today, 07:25
Smolone hurt himself in an attempt to steal the money for the purchase.

That's why a man wrote... False report. He was prosecuted for this.

Yesterday, 22:39
An ex-police officer who was caught stealing drugs from broadcasts appealed his sentence.
The Smolen Regional Court today, 14 February, examined the appeal of a former investigator who " failed " the case of a suspected mephedrone trader.
yesterday, 21:41
The driver who hit the zebre in the centre of Smolensk was trying to blame him for the accident.
A young man who was hospitalized in the Red Cross after a road incident brought an accident to court.
yesterday, 20:59
Vladimir Putin denounced an unprecedented increase in medical payments
These measures will help to address the human resource deficit in health, especially in rural areas.
yesterday, 20:15.
In all the corners of the Smollers, there is a " hero " event.
Hundreds of e-mails and warm things will be handed to the fighters to Father's Day.
yesterday, 19:38.
On the holidays of February, the IFC of the Smole Region will change the schedule of work
IFAC reported on the adjustment of the working hours for the Father ' s Day.
Yesterday, 7:00.
Sergei Yakimov: " Go to the Olympic victory begins in small sports halls at home! "
“Tonight together.Minister of the Russian Federation for the Smole region, Artem Malachenkov♪Astashhenkov brothersSmolenska sports school No. 2 congratulatedA well-deserved RF coach, Alexander Gavrilov70 years"Editor-in-chief of the Road,
yesterday, 18:51
Smylanin will answer the court for stealing money from a teenager's card.

In Viasima, a girl lost a bank card. A man found her outside one of the houses.

yesterday, 18:13
The fraudsters call the moles on behalf of the President of the Regional Duma of Igor Lakhova
Unknown are asked to provide financial assistance for various needs and to scare the militia.
yesterday, 17:36
Silvan remembered children after 40 hours of work.

A man owes three underage children 889 thousand roubles. He was approached in a proper manner by a bailiff on the Kardimov and Krasnin region.

yesterday, 17:01
The synoptics promise the moles another cold day before another warming.
At the end of the working week, weather swings will begin again.
Yesterday, 16:25
In Smole province, 383 children were born in January
The number of deaths is 3.5 times higher.
Yesterday, 15:49
Vasily Anohin will visit the Dorokobuz district
The head of the region invites the inhabitants of the municipality to meet.
yesterday, 15:10
Smolin has spoken about stealing copper to make the moon.

Two men from Cardamovo gathered to talk, drinking alcohol. Suddenly the idea was to steal the honey to make the moon.

Yesterday, 14:32
Where Cold water will be shut off in Smallsk at night.
By morning, water promises to return.
yesterday, 13:54
Smolenske celebrated the 35th anniversary of the withdrawal of troops from Afghanistan.
On 13 February, a solemn event was held at the Regional Centre to mark the withdrawal of Soviet troops from Afghanistan. On the eve of the 35th anniversary of the memorable day of the slaughter, the history of the conflict, its heroes and honoured the memory of the soldiers and officers who died while they were...
Yesterday, 13:07
Conviction for attempted theft of 2.6 million roubles from the Smolene aeroplane plant
The former equipment engineer, using his office position, wanted to take a high-value shopping scam.
